text: NFL RedZone is an American sports television channel. It has been owned and operated by NFL Network since 2009. It broadcasts on Sundays during the NFL regular season from 1:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m. Eastern, or when the last afternoon window game ends. It provides "whip around" simulcast coverage of all Sunday afternoon games airing in-progress on CBS and Fox. Category:American television channels Category:2009 establishments in the United States
title: NFL RedZone
